title: How to Make Lemon Pepper Tortilla Crusted Fish

steps.headline: Chop 6 fresh corn tortillas to fine crumb in a food processor or blender.
Add 2 teaspoons lemon pepper to tortilla breading.
Add 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder to tortilla breading.
Add 1 teaspoon fresh squeezed lemon juice to breading.
Beat one egg to make an egg wash.
Dip the fish filet in the egg wash, then dip in tortilla breading on both sides.
Place on greased cookie sheet and bake for about 15 minutes or until fish is cooked through and tortilla breading is crisp.
Serve with wedge of lemon for extra flavor.

text: Preheat the oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Chop 6 fresh corn tortillas to fine crumb in a food processor or blender.  Add 2 teaspoons lemon pepper to tortilla breading.  Add 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder to tortilla breading.  Add 1 teaspoon fresh squeezed lemon juice to breading.  Beat one egg to make an egg wash.  Dip the fish filet in the egg wash, then dip in tortilla breading on both sides.  Place on greased cookie sheet and bake for about 15 minutes or until fish is cooked through and tortilla breading is crisp.  Serve with wedge of lemon for extra flavor.  Garnish with fresh parsley.
